app.title: My Website
favorites.rich: My favorite cafe in Münster is {cafe}. And my favorite programming language is {language}. I enjoy reading science-fiction books like {book} and listening to music by {artist}.
favorites.html: My favorite cafe in Münster is Kaffeegiesserei. And my favorite programming language is Go. I enjoy reading science-fiction books like Dark Matter and listening to music by Provinz.
home.hero.title: Hi, I am Johann
home.hero.description: I am a software developer from Münster. When I am not coding, I enjoy reading or a good coffee.
home.projects.heading: Projects
home.projects.onlineStorage.title: Online Furniture Storage
home.projects.onlineStorage.description: The online furniture storage allows users to post donation offers for furniture and bicycles. The project was implemented in collaboration with the St. Peter und Paul parish in Velen.
home.projects.ticketSystem.title: Ticket System
home.projects.ticketSystem.description: As part of a research and development project at FH Münster, a ticket system was developed. The system was built with Flutter and made available as both an app and a website.
home.projects.eventinator.title: Eventinator
home.projects.eventinator.description: As part of our studies at FH Münster, we developed an app for organizing private events. Core features include participating in polls and taking on tasks.
home.projects.musicSpotlight.title: Your Music Spotlight
home.projects.musicSpotlight.description: Your Music Spotlight is a web app built on the Spotify API. It shows your favorite artists and songs.
home.skills.heading: Skills
home.skills.languages.title: Languages
home.skills.frameworks.title: Frameworks and Libraries
home.skills.tools.title: Tools and Systems
home.favorites.heading: Favorite Things
home.favorites.rich: My favorite cafe in Münster is {cafe}. And my favorite programming language is {language}. I enjoy reading science-fiction books like {book} and listening to music by {artist}.
home.contact.rich: Feel free to send me a message on {linkedin} or {instagram}. Or send me an {mail}. I am looking forward to hearing from you!
